articles.description: Gujarat-based Jyoti CNC Automation on Thursday announced that the company has fixed a price band of Rs 315-331 per share for its initial public offering (IPO). Jyoti CNC Automation IPO is the first mainboard IPO to hit the NSE and BSE in 2024.

articles.title: Bajaj Finance shares jump over 4% on Q3 updates - The Economic Times
articles.description: Bajaj Finance's deposit book stood at approximately Rs 58,000 crore as of 31 December 2023 as compared to Rs 42,984 crore in the year-ago period. This translates into a 35% growth year-on-year (YoY).
